YAML front matter

July 9, 2015

YAML front matter is perhaps the most important aspect of creating sites through Jekyll. It allows you to control how Jekyll processes and builds pages, create page-specific variables, and triggers file processing. Letâ€™s take a closer look at front matter and how it can help you create more efficient Jekyll sites. Read more
